channel.title: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?
channel.description:
Well, I've been debating this at school.
I would like for some 'information' about which is worse, and the website you got the details from.
I personally think, if you grow your own weed, it would prob be better for you then alcohol because it dosen't have any added chemical such as angel dust.

item.title: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

zammyking111:

It’s a proven fact that weed is better for you than alcohol and cigs, cause cigs contain many carcinogenic chemicals, while alcohol contains a deadly chemical that can destroy all ur inside organs. While weed only have a slight effect on the brain that doesn’t last forever.

weed has no proven negative effects on the brain

Read full topic
item.source: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?

item.title: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“jensie, post:32, topic:275991”]Fact.

BUT Heroin is physicly addictive… Cigarettes nor alcohol are.[/quote]

What?

Cigarettes and alcohol are physically addictive. Statistically speaking, cigarettes are more addictive than heroin. Alcohol addiction is also very intense, you can die from the withdrawels.

item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman

@Mopman wrote:

That arm damage (and the one in requiem) is caused by infection.

You can inject without causing infection and you can take heroin with injecting.

Read full topic
item.source: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?

item.title: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:27, topic:275991”][quote author=jensie link=topic=364540.msg2836867#msg2836867 date=1245721810]

I think that weed is much better for you because it grows out of the ground and then you smoke it, but with cigs the tobacco is grown, refined and then additives are added (such as rat poison [wtf]).

I don’t really drink to much so I do not know too much about alcohol.
[/quote]Heroïn is made from Poppy, from which they make opium. Poppy as we all know, is a pure product of nature. Heroïn would be more healthy than tabacco according to your theory…

And it is.

To clarify, I assume when you say healthy you aren’t including overdose (which is easily avoidable assuming you know the potency of your product and aren’t a raging addict) or “potential to destroy your life” which is a pretty abstract thing (and dying destroys your life anyway, so)

If we are talking about “most likely to kill you used regularly” or “most likely to damage your health”, tobacco is far far far worse than heroin. A heroin addict with an unlimited supply of heroin who dosen’t fuck up can maintain his habit for a lifetime with very little ill effects, a smoker who smokes every day is pretty much gonna die from a smoke-related disease.

I say this as a smoker, and someone who has never done heroin :P[/quote]
Did you ever see requiem for a dream?
Look at some of these pictures:
http://images.google.be/images?rlz=1C1GGLS_nlBE310BE311&sourceid=chrome&q=heroin%20arm&um=1&ie=UTF-8&sa=N&hl=nl&tab=wi

Read full topic
item.source: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?

item.title: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Sure, your liver regenerates… if you stop drinking. When’s the last time you didn’t drink for sufficient time?

Liver damage is hardly the only health issue either.

Read full topic
item.source: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?

item.title: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I’m a pretty heavy drinker myself at times, when compared to what’s considered ‘safe’.
I believe alcohol receives less criticism due to the liver’s ability to heal itself. The lungs, by comparison, are completely incapable of self-restoration, making the damage caused by smoking anything that much worse.

To cut a long story short, none of these options are completely risk-free. However the liver can, and will, mend itself, making alcohol less potent over a large period of use (this is my opinion and understanding at least).

When comparing both cigarettes and the smoking of weed, I would say that weed is the healthier of the two. I’m a non-smoker, but I believe something that grows in the dirt would have to be better for you than something artificially made like cigarettes.

Read full topic
item.source: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?

item.title: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“jensie, post:26, topic:275991”][quote author=grantbm link=topic=364540.msg2818051#msg2818051 date=1244403190]
I think that weed is much better for you because it grows out of the ground and then you smoke it, but with cigs the tobacco is grown, refined and then additives are added (such as rat poison [wtf]).

I don’t really drink to much so I do not know too much about alcohol.
[/quote]Heroïn is made from Poppy, from which they make opium. Poppy as we all know, is a pure product of nature. Heroïn would be more healthy than tabacco according to your theory…[/quote]

And it is.

To clarify, I assume when you say healthy you aren’t including overdose (which is easily avoidable assuming you know the potency of your product and aren’t a raging addict) or “potential to destroy your life” which is a pretty abstract thing (and dying destroys your life anyway, so)

If we are talking about “most likely to kill you used regularly” or “most likely to damage your health”, tobacco is far far far worse than heroin. A heroin addict with an unlimited supply of heroin who dosen’t fuck up can maintain his habit for a lifetime with very little ill effects, a smoker who smokes every day is pretty much gonna die from a smoke-related disease.

I say this as a smoker, and someone who has never done heroin

Read full topic

item.title: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

[quote=“grantbm, post:23, topic:275991”]I think that weed is much better for you because it grows out of the ground and then you smoke it, but with cigs the tobacco is grown, refined and then additives are added (such as rat poison [wtf]).

I don’t really drink to much so I do not know too much about alcohol.[/quote]

Not just that though, THC, the shit that’s in weed doesn’t harm your body at all, it’s like 1 in 1000 to get paranoid or a mental condition from smoking pot but statistics like that are bullshit cause it’s something like 1 in 1000 people that have a mental condition or are paranoid so really it’s just bullshit that anti-pot activists spread.

Pretty much the negative effects of weed are incredibly small whilst negative effects of alcohol and cigerettes are obvious and huge.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed better for you then Alcohol or a Cig?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

What the fuck does paranoia have to do with suicide?

“Oh no I have to go home and my mom might know I’m high, i should kill myself!” or “oshit is that a cop car?? *slits throat”

doesn’t happen. I don’t think you know what paranoia is. And it doesn’t make you kill yourself, period. The only thing that leads to suicide is yourself.

Read full topic
